Articles.Content: I was watching the cinematic trailer (I lost count how many) and noticed at one point one of the kerbals cracked their knuckles. With fingers! In a space suit! Now even in ksp 1 kerbals had fingers (see Gene in upper right corner of 1.7.1-1.7.3 launcher), but I liked the oven mitt like gloves. It kinda looked like the kerbals were getting ready to go skiing. So  this merits several  questions, how will kerbals use their fingers? Will new emotes be released? Will kerbals react more to dangerous situations (If so, I’m building a kerbalcoaster)? What will planting a flag look like? Will we be able to watch Jeb try to eat a sandwich with a helmet on?

Nobody said it was problematic. OP was just excitedly pointing out that a Kerbal was cracking his knuckles while wearing gloves.

Now, IRL that might be a bit tough with the size of real spacesuit gloves and their stiffness from being pressurized, but that's not really a detail that concerns me in a game where I can magically make helmets disappear.
